resources.string: Enter the selective code to access it as an evaluator. If you do not know the code, ask the responsible administrator who created the code.
Sign up and improve your seletions
With this team you can create a test selective to see how the application works.

PCongratulations, your selective was created successfully. Now for her role, we here at Combine Brasil, we will analyze it and authorize it. If we need some information missing, it is wise that we will contact you, but if everything is correct, it was already, lets find out the best of the athlete !!!
To stay up-to-date, we want some media in the team social media (facebook, instagram, site, etc.)
The athlete must accecpt the therms of service
TERM OF LIABILITY, PHYSICAL CONDITIONS AND USE OF IMAGE
Change the test time as desired.
Enter yout email to retrieve the password
Enter team code to start creating your selective
Enter an email from team representatives
You do not have permission to edit the team

Congratulations, your selective was created successfully. In order for others to assist in their selective click on the code above and only divulge it to their evaluators, ensuring the entry of unauthorized users. We send to your registered email the registration form for the candidates, the registrations made by them are linked directly to this selective, check in your inbox.
Please wait, searching for your history ...
Qualify the performance of the athlete in the test.
In vertical jump tests, the athlete wingspan is required, which consists of the height between the athlete hands at the feet above the head, with his arm fully stretched, as in the example below:

To register an athlete, make sure that the athlete has already made the first registration with the administrator. After that, inform the registration code (unique code that the administrator has), and also the code of the athlete, in which the same was registered by the administrator, and informed after the registered. You can also put the name to view more easily at the time the athlete performs their tests.
Ops ... We did not find any results for your search. Maybe the athlete has not been updated on his cell phone yet.
Ops ... No search results were found.
Make sure there is no typing error

Ops...
Apparently your device is not connected to the internet.
Try to connect again.
You registered some athletes in the selective, however you were without connection to the internet, and for that reason, the athletes were not saved.

Nullam lectus justo,
Find the athlete easily in line
You have in your hands, tests of high standard that will be able to evaluate the growth and qualification of the athletes
Do not waste time, just check in the app
Quickly find the athletes who will perform their selective
In addition to the test result for the athlete, evaluate the performance of how he performed the test
Safely save test data with internet connection
Your selective become reports in the palm of your hand
Want to check for new registered athletes?
The code you entered is invalid
You need an internet connection to continue
The code was emailed to the team representatives
Are you offline, want to save the user offline? You should synchronize with the other reviewers.
To continue, the athlete must accept the terms of use.
E-mail of the user is already registered
Athlete created, the athlete code is: {CODE_INSCRIPTION}. Inform other reviewers.
Athlete successfully registered. The athlete code is: {CODE_ATHLETE}
Error trying to set up positions
Invalid data, please check to continue.
The date you selected should be greater than the current date.
The second should be larger than the first one selected.
The third must be greater than the second selected.
Team created successfully. We will review the staff created in our system, and return to the contacts
The team {TEAM} is already registered at Combine Brasil
You must fill at least the city
Are you sure you want to quit and quit the test?
To start synchronization, you need to have an internet connection
You do not have permission to edit the poll
Invalid data, please check to continue.
Your user does not exist, please create your user to continue.
Enter your email to retrieve the password
We send a new password in your email
The code you entered does not exist.
Passwords must be the same to change

Congratulations, you were summoned to evaluate the selective, on the date (s). Download the Combine Brasil Analytics application in GooglePlay and log in to the selective one using the code: {CODE}.For more information, contact the representative of Combine Brasil - Discovering the best of the athlete -http: //combinebrasil.com/

Congratulations, you were summoned to evaluate in the {seletiva}, on the date (s) {date_selective}. Download the Combine Brasil Analytics app on Google Play.https: //play.google.com/store/apps/details?d=br.com.john.combinebrasil. Log in to the pickup using the code: {CODE}. For more information, contact the {EQUIPE} representative - Discovering the best of the athlete http://combinebrasil.com/
The timer has been completed, enter the athlete score.
Invalid time, you can not start the timer at 00:00.
Enter the number of reps to save
I declare to the proper ends of law and science that:

1. I will participate in the selective and if selected case of the training and games of American Football and I am in good health and able to participate in the selective, training and games, not presenting any type of impediment or restriction to the practice and physical and sports. 2.Assume, all risks and legal responsibility of my actions involved in the participation of selective, training and games. Exempting the team, technical team and organizer, collaborators and sponsors FROM ANY AND ANY LIABILITY for any material, moral or physical damages that they may suffer or cause. 3. In case of injuries of the athlete, will be activated the service of medical attention of the public network to attend the happened thing. The athlete or his / her companion may decide to attend, remove or transfer to hospitals of the private health network, exempting from any responsibility, the team, technical and organizing committee, collaborators and sponsors of the expenses incurred by this service. 5. I universally and irrevocably and irrevocably grant the right to use my image, voice, sounds to be captured in the selective, training and games, for informative, promotional or advertising purposes, without incurring any burden on the team, commission organizer and partners. Renouncing the receipt of any income that may be earned with such rights at any time / date, being the rights reserved to the team and organizing committee. 6. The team may request the athlete to take periodic medical examinations for training and games, if this is not done and presented, then this test will be replaced by this TERMS OF LIABILITY, exempting the team and assuming the athlete its consequences. 7. The forum of the city of São Jose dos Campos, in favor of any other, however privileged, is elected to resolve any questions arising from this Term of Responsibility.
You can customize your selection by choosing the number of tests you want and according to your needs
To obtain the report applied to the Combine Brasil Methodology it is necessary to select 8 tests within the 3 existing categories.
Required Tests: Mandatory tests for the report applied to the Combine Brazil Methodology;
Recommended Tests: Tests necessary to have the complete report, being able to choose between one option or another among the sibling tests;
Additional tests: Tests that increase physical knowledge about participants, but are not required to get the full report .;
When leaving all the data will be deleted from the application, do you really want to quit?
To create a selective, you must accept the terms of use.
Was charged R$ {quantidade} reais per registration
Oops, the jump is too high, check and try again
Do you want to save the result?
Do you want to delete the data from the current test?
Want to leave in the middle of the test?
Search by team name or team name.

You can customize your selection by choosing the number of tests you want and according to your needs.{BREAK} To obtain the report applied to the Combine Brazil Methodology it is necessary to select 8 tests within the 3 existing categories.{BREAK} Required Tests: Mandatory tests for the report applied to the Combine Brazil Methodology;{BREAK} Recommended Tests: Tests necessary to have the complete report, being able to choose between one option or another among the sibling tests;{BREAK} Additional tests: Tests that increase physical knowledge about participants, but are not required to get the full report.

I declare to the appropriate legal and scientific ends that: {BREAKLINE} {BREAKLINE}1. I will participate in the selective and if selected case of the training and games of American Football and am in good health and able to participate in the selective, training and games, not presenting any type of impediment or restriction to the practice and physical and sports. {BREAKLINE} {BREAKLINE}2.Assume, all risks and legal responsibility of my actions involved in the participation of selective, training and games. By exempting the team, technical team and organizers, collaborators and sponsors FROM ANY AND ANY LIABILITY for any material, moral or physical damages that they may suffer or cause. {BREAKLINE} {BREAKLINE}3. In case of injuries of the athlete, will be activated the service of medical attention of the public network to attend the happened thing. The athlete or his / her companion may decide to attend, remove or transfer to hospitals of the private health network, exempting from any responsibility, the team, technical and organizing committee, collaborators and sponsors of the expenses incurred by this service. {BREAKLINE} {BREAKLINE}5. I universally and irrevocably and irrevocably grant the right to use my image, voice, sounds to be captured in the selective, training and games, for informative, promotional or advertising purposes, without incurring any burden on the team, commission organizer and partners. Renewing the receipt of any income that may be earned with such rights at any time / date, being the rights reserved to the team and organizing committee. {BREAKLINE} {BREAKLINE}6. The team may request the athlete to take periodic medical examinations for training and games, if this is not done and presented, then this examination will be substituted by this TERMS OF LIABILITY, exempting the team and assuming the athlete its consequences. {BREAKLINE}7. The forum of the city of São Jose dos Campos, in favor of any other, however privileged, is elected to resolve any questions arising from this Term of Responsibility.
